attributes.action: Allow Scotland to adopt its own time zone
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Allow Scotland to set up its own time zone in order that it can change its clocks to suit the needs of its citizens every year without the entire nation having to do the same. This would save the consequent rise in road deaths, increased fossil fuel consumption and inconvenience it causes for the majority of people who live in the UK.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive / Welsh Assembly / Northern Ireland Executive as appropriate.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
